about_the_game:
Enter the shadows of one of the darkest, most enigmatic buildings you’ll ever explore. Inside these cursed walls, nothing is as it seems. Each step uncovers fragments of a story drenched in deceit, desperation, and survival. You will meet liars, killers, and victims of this harrowing environment—along with a few who may hold the keys to your salvation.

As a nameless protagonist, your journey is driven by the chilling need to uncover the secrets buried deep within "the house." Search for hidden paths, solve cryptic mysteries, and confront the horrors that await. But beware: Not all doors should be opened, and not all who dwell here wish you well.

  • Exploration Meets Terror: Delve into a grim, atmospheric world designed to unsettle you with haunting visuals and an eerie soundtrack.

  • Meaningful Choices: Your decisions matter. Engage with NPCs through branching dialogue, altering your path and the unfolding narrative.

  • Survival Over Shooting: Ammo is scarce, and danger is everywhere. Choose your battles wisely—sometimes, running is the only option.

  • Unlock the Unknown: Seek out vital items and NPCs to progress, piecing together the disturbing truth of your environment.

  • A Distinctive Retro Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in the original Game Boy resolution (160x144), brought to life with stunning, handcrafted pixel art that adds a nostalgic yet deeply unsettling charm to every scene.

Find the "Key of All Evil" and unlock the house's mysteries —if you dare. Every choice, every encounter, and every step takes you closer to an ending shaped by your actions.
Welcome to the house.

Welcome to your nightmare. Welcome home.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mature Content Description

This game contains mature themes and unsettling content that may not be suitable for all audiences. Players will encounter depictions of violence, disturbing imagery, and psychological horror. The storyline explores dark topics such as murder, manipulation, and despair, with characters who have suffered or committed heinous acts.

There are no depictions of sexual acts or explicit sexual content, but the atmosphere and themes are deeply unsettling and intended to evoke fear and discomfort. Viewer discretion is advised, particularly for those sensitive to intense psychological tension or graphic scenarios.

short_description: Experience a gruesome adventure in monochrome 4-color pixel art. Exit the castle and figure out what happened by investigating objects and fighting enemies - remember, you only have one life.
